results.title: The Breakout Stars of 2020
results.abstract: Here are the 12 stars and trends that managed to thrive and shine in an impossible year.

results.abstract: Carey Mulligan stars in this feminist revenge thriller that too often backs away from its potentially searing setup.

results.title: Can We Talk About the Mom in ‘A Christmas Story’?
results.abstract: The woman hasn’t had a hot meal in 15 years and she’s always cooped up at home. 2020 is the year to give this character from a classic holiday movie her due.

results.title: ‘The Dissident’ Review: A Murder for Power
results.abstract: Bryan Fogel’s new documentary about the killing of Jamal Khashoggi underlines the disregard for human rights when money and geopolitics are at play.
